thread.title: Chicago suspects in videotaped beating plead not guilty | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Chicago suspects in videotaped beating plead not guilty | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: Chicago suspects in videotaped beating plead not guilty | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Four black torture suspects plead not guilty to kidnapping a white mentally disabled teen and streaming the attack on Facebook Live in hate crime that shocked the nation Public defenders for all four suspects - Tanishia Covington, 24, Brittany Covington, 18, Jordan Hill, 18, and Tesfaye Cooper, 18, - entered not guilty pleas The black suspects are charged with a hate crime in a brutal attack of a white man with mental disabilities The attack gained notoriety after footage of the attack was live-streamed to Facebook Live Published: 17:15 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 21:13 GMT, 10 February 2017 109 shares
